extendedInfo.description: A bit fun for everyone's favourite TV show, do you have what it takes? Are you the Breaking Bad master? Find out by playing this quiz!This quiz will test your knowledge on Breaking Bad, from Walter White to right back to questions relating to when he was still working at a school. The quiz ranges from Easy to Hard. Do you think you have what it takes to complete this application in hard mode?With over 500 questions it's safe to say that you can play this quiz over and over again and still learn more and more about the show. From obvious to obscure questions there's plenty to interest every Breaking Bad fan out there! This application can be played offline which means you can test yourself in your free time instead of having to wait until you get somewhere with an internet connection. Bored on your daily commute? Maybe this application will help! After all, we all love Breaking Bad!

reviews.title: Don\'t download
reviews.comment: Everytime I got so far into the quiz I got kicked out and had to start over so never got to the end to know how many I got right or wat the right answers were. Plz fix this!!! My another in-law and I love quizzing ourselves
reviews.author: Stephanie Thomas

reviews.title: Very fun and awesome app!
reviews.comment: At first it didn\'t work on my phone, buy I messaged the dev and he fixed it within a day! Church.  Any fan of Breaking Bad should have this app!
reviews.author: Lavender Gooms

reviews.title: Shygirl303
reviews.comment: It has the wrong answers for alot of the questions uninstalling now
reviews.author: Alicia Del Valle

reviews.title: Rushed
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t tell you what you got wrong, and attempting to leave feedback from the in-app button causes the app the crash.  Very poorly built app.
reviews.author: Adam Partain
